message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. It's a high-quality item that truly stands out in its category. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its value, I propose a price of $120 for you to experience all that this product has to offer. I trust this price reflects not only the cost of the product but also the unique benefits it provides. Looking forward to your positive response.
